verbose_text: There, callose synthases with their multi membrane spanning domains XREF_BIBR are reintegrated into the plasma membrane to initiate callose biosynthesis and deposition of this (1,3)-beta-glucan polymer between the plasma membrane and the cellulosic cell wall.
evidence: callose synthases with their multi membrane-spanning domains XREF_BIBR  are reintegrated into the plasma membrane to initiate callose biosynthesis
